```{r}

install.packages("mondate")
library(mondate)

library(stringr)

library(lubridate)

if (!require(remotes)) install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("keithabailey/PRMTools")
library(PRMTools)

if (!require(dplyr)) install.packages("dplyr")
library(dplyr)

suppressPackageStartupMessages(if (!require(xts)) install.packages("xts"))
library(xts)
suppressPackageStartupMessages(if (!require(forecast)) install.packages("forecast") )
library(forecast)

if (!require(rlist)) install.packages("rlist")
library(rlist)


if (!require(Ecdat)) install.packages("Ecdat")
library(Ecdat)

if (!require(ggplot2)) install.packages("ggplot2")
library(ggplot2)

if (!require(Hmisc)) install.packages("Hmisc")
library(Hmisc)

if (!require(ISLR)) install.packages("ISLR")
library(ISLR)
```

```{r}
#Read files

sales_data_mod_a2020 <- read.csv("sales_data_mod_a2020.csv")
sales_data_mod_b2020 <- read.csv("sales_data_mod_b2020.csv")

head(sales_data_mod_a2020)

```
```{r}
q1 = summary(sales_data_mod_a2020$comp_ratio_1000_total)[2]
q3 = summary(sales_data_mod_a2020$comp_ratio_1000_total)[5]
t_min = q1 - (1.5*IQR(sales_data_mod_a2020$comp_ratio_1000_total))
t_max = q3 + (1.5*IQR(sales_data_mod_a2020$comp_ratio_1000_total))
sales_data_mod_a2020 <- sales_data_mod_a2020%>% mutate(outlier = case_when(comp_ratio_1000_total<t_min ~ -1, comp_ratio_1000_total>t_max ~ 1, TRUE ~ 0))

```


```{r}
sales_data_mod_a2020$month <- format(as.Date(sales_data_mod_a2020$zillow_month_day),"%m")
nlag = 4
sales_data_mod_a2020_lag <- sales_data_mod_a2020%>%group_by(zillow_zip)%>%arrange(desc(zillow_month_day))%>%mutate(zillow_sales_value_index_lag = lag(zillow_sales_value_index, n = nlag),zillow_month_day_lag = lag(zillow_month_day, n = nlag))


sales_data_mod_a2020_lag <- sales_data_mod_a2020_lag%>%mutate(zillow_month_day_lag = ifelse(!is.na(zillow_sales_value_index_lag), zillow_month_day_lag, format(ceiling_date(as.Date(zillow_month_day), "month") + months(nlag) - days(1),"%Y-%m-%d") ))%>%arrange(zillow_zip,zillow_month_day)

tail(sales_data_mod_a2020_lag%>%filter(zillow_zip == 10001)%>%select(zillow_month_day,zillow_month_day_lag,zillow_sales_value_index,zillow_sales_value_index_lag, outlier),nlag*2)


```

Sales low income Train model (train inference window 2021-05-31 - 2022-09-30):

```{r}
sales_data_mod_a2020_lag_train <- sales_data_mod_a2020_lag%>%filter(as.Date(zillow_month_day_lag)<as.Date("2022-10-31"))
tail(sales_data_mod_a2020_lag_train%>%filter(zillow_zip == 10001)%>%select(zillow_month_day,zillow_month_day_lag,zillow_sales_value_index,zillow_sales_value_index_lag, outlier),nlag*2)
list_columns <- colnames(sales_data_mod_a2020_lag_train)
filter_columns = list_columns[grepl("^comp_ratio*|^zillow_sales_value_index|var_zip|^month", list_columns)]
filter_columns = filter_columns[!filter_columns %in% c("month_number","zillow_sales_value_index")]
df_lma2020_low_lag_train <- sales_data_mod_a2020_lag_train%>%filter(outlier==0)%>%filter(income_group=="low")%>%filter(!is.na(zillow_sales_value_index_lag))%>%select(filter_columns)
lma2020_low_lag_train <- lm(zillow_sales_value_index_lag ~ .-zillow_zip, data=df_lma2020_low_lag_train)  

cat("\nAdjusted R square:")
summary(lma2020_low_lag_train)$adj.r.squared
cat("\nFStatistic:")
summary(lma2020_low_lag_train)$fstatistic

cat("\nNumber of significant variables:")
nrow(data.frame(summary(lma2020_low_lag_train)$coefficients)%>%filter(.[[4]] <0.05))
cat("\nLargest coefficients:")
head(data.frame(summary(lma2020_low_lag_train)$coefficients)%>%filter(.[[4]] <0.05)%>% arrange(desc(abs(Estimate))),20)
sel_columns_lma2020_low_lag_train <- row.names(data.frame(summary(lma2020_low_lag_train)$coefficients)%>%filter(.[[4]] <0.05))

```
Optimized train model and test window:

```{r}
df_lma2020_low_lag_opt_train <- sales_data_mod_a2020_lag_train%>%filter(outlier==0)%>%filter(income_group=="low")%>%filter(!is.na(zillow_sales_value_index_lag))%>%select(c(sel_columns_lma2020_low_lag_train[!grepl("var_zip|^month|*Intercept*",sel_columns_lma2020_low_lag_train)],var_zip,month,zillow_sales_value_index_lag,zillow_month_day_lag))

lma2020_low_lag_opt_train <- lm(zillow_sales_value_index_lag ~ . -zillow_zip, data=df_lma2020_low_lag_opt_train%>%select(!zillow_month_day_lag))

cat("\nAdjusted R square in train window:")
summary(lma2020_low_lag_opt_train)$adj.r.squared
cat("\nFStatistic in train window:")
summary(lma2020_low_lag_opt_train)$fstatistic

cat("\nNumber of significant variables:")
nrow(data.frame(summary(lma2020_low_lag_opt_train)$coefficients))
cat("\nLargest coefficients:")
data.frame(summary(lma2020_low_lag_opt_train)$coefficients)%>% arrange(desc(abs(Estimate)))
cat("\nComplaint coefficients:")
data.frame(summary(lma2020_low_lag_opt_train)$coefficients)[sel_columns_lma2020_low_lag_train[grepl("comp_ratio|Intercept",sel_columns_lma2020_low_lag_train)],]%>% arrange(desc(abs(Estimate)))

dfpred_lma2020_low_lag_opt_test <- sales_data_mod_a2020_lag%>%filter(as.Date(zillow_month_day_lag)>=as.Date("2022-10-31"))%>%filter(outlier==0)%>%filter(income_group=="low")%>%select(zillow_month_day, zillow_sales_value_index, c(sel_columns_lma2020_low_lag_train[!grepl("var_zip|^month|*Intercept*",sel_columns_lma2020_low_lag_train)],var_zip,month,zillow_sales_value_index_lag,zillow_month_day_lag))

dfpred_lma2020_low_lag_opt_train <- sales_data_mod_a2020_lag%>%filter(as.Date(zillow_month_day_lag)<as.Date("2022-10-31"))%>%filter(outlier==0)%>%filter(income_group=="low")%>%select(c(sel_columns_lma2020_low_lag_train[!grepl("var_zip|^month|*Intercept*",sel_columns_lma2020_low_lag_train)],var_zip,month,zillow_sales_value_index_lag,zillow_month_day_lag))

tail(dfpred_lma2020_low_lag_opt_test%>%filter(zillow_zip == 10030))

dfpred_lma2020_low_lag_opt_train$prediction <- predict(lma2020_low_lag_opt_train, newdata=dfpred_lma2020_low_lag_opt_train%>%select(!zillow_month_day_lag))

dfpred_lma2020_low_lag_opt_test$prediction <- predict(lma2020_low_lag_opt_train, newdata=dfpred_lma2020_low_lag_opt_test%>%select(!zillow_month_day_lag))

dfpred_lma2020_low_lag_opt_test$train_prediction <- NA
dfpred_lma2020_low_lag_opt_train$train_prediction <- dfpred_lma2020_low_lag_opt_train$prediction
dfpred_lma2020_low_lag_opt_train$prediction <- NA
dfpred_lma2020_low_lag_opt_test <- rbind(dfpred_lma2020_low_lag_opt_train,dfpred_lma2020_low_lag_opt_test)


y_actual = dfpred_lma2020_low_lag_opt_test%>%filter(as.Date(zillow_month_day_lag)>=as.Date("2022-10-31")&as.Date(zillow_month_day_lag)<as.Date("2023-02-28"))%>%select(zillow_sales_value_index_lag)
y_pred = dfpred_lma2020_low_lag_opt_test%>%filter(as.Date(zillow_month_day_lag)>=as.Date("2022-10-31")&as.Date(zillow_month_day_lag)<as.Date("2023-02-28"))%>%select(prediction)

y_actual=y_actual$zillow_sales_value_index_lag
y_pred = y_pred$prediction

cat("\nMean absolute error in prediction window:")
mean(abs((y_actual-y_pred)/y_actual))
cat("\nAdjusted R2 in prediction window:")
k = nrow(data.frame(summary(lma2020_low_lag_opt_train)$coefficients))
n = length(y_actual)
1 - ((1-cor(y_actual,y_pred)^2)*(n-1)/(n-k-1))



ggplot(data = dfpred_lma2020_low_lag_opt_test%>%select(zillow_month_day_lag, prediction, train_prediction, zillow_sales_value_index_lag),aes(x = as.Date(zillow_month_day_lag))) + 
  stat_summary(aes(y = prediction, colour = "Predicted Index in test window (n+4)"),geom = "line", fun = "mean", size= 1) +
  stat_summary(aes(y = prediction),geom = "ribbon", fun.data = "mean_cl_normal", alpha = 0.1,fill = "red") +
  stat_summary(aes(y=train_prediction, colour = "Predicted Index in training window"), geom = "line", fun = "mean", size= 1) +
  stat_summary(aes(y = train_prediction),geom = "ribbon", fun.data = "mean_cl_normal", alpha = 0.05,fill = "black") +
  stat_summary(aes(y=zillow_sales_value_index_lag, colour = "Actual Index"), geom = "line", fun = "mean", size= 1) +
  stat_summary(aes(y = zillow_sales_value_index_lag),geom = "ribbon", fun.data = "mean_cl_normal", alpha = 0.1,fill = "blue") +
  scale_colour_manual("", 
                      breaks = c("Predicted Index in test window (n+4)", "Actual Index", "Predicted Index in training window"),
                      values = c("red", "blue", "black")) +
  xlab("Date")+
  ylab("Sales Zillow Home Value Index")+
  ggtitle("2021-2023 Zillow Home Value Time Series \n Low income areas - Forecast Prediction (n+4) vs Actual Index")



```

  stat_summary(aes(y = prediction),geom = "ribbon", fun.data = "mean_cl_normal", alpha = 0.1,fill = "red") +
  stat_summary(aes(y=train_prediction, colour = "Predicted Index in training window"), geom = "line", fun = "mean", size= 1) +
  stat_summary(aes(y = train_prediction),geom = "ribbon", fun.data = "mean_cl_normal", alpha = 0.05,fill = "black") +
  stat_summary(aes(y=zillow_sales_value_index_lag, colour = "Actual Index"), geom = "line", fun = "mean", size= 1) +
  stat_summary(aes(y = zillow_sales_value_index_lag),geom = "ribbon", fun.data = "mean_cl_normal", alpha = 0.1,fill = "blue") +
  scale_colour_manual("", 
                      breaks = c("Predicted Index in test window (n+4)", "Actual Index", "Predicted Index in training window"),
                      values = c("red", "blue", "black")) +
  xlab("Date")+
  ylab("Sales Zillow Home Value Index")+
  ggtitle("2021-2023 Zillow Home Value Time Series \n High income areas - Forecast Prediction (n+4) vs Actual Index")
